name: 妮科尔·舍温
introduction: Nicole Sherwin is a South African-born actress based in Cape Town, known for her diverse career in film and television. Schooled in Sussex in England, Nicole furthered her education at Laine Theatre Performing Arts Academy in England before establishing herself as a professional dancer and actress in the UK. Her career later expanded internationally, leading to roles in major productions across television and film. Nicole's most recent role is Lian, Roofmistress to the Aiel people in Amazon Prime's Wheel of Time, Season 3. She also appeared in season 4 of the critically acclaimed series Homeland and the action-thriller Safe House. Other film and television credits include Charlie, based on the life of London gangster Charlie Richardson. Cape Town, an adaptation of Deon Myers' book Dead Before Dying, and tv series Tropical Heat/Sweating Bullets. Her film credits also include Citizen Verdict, and The Da Vinci Treasure, where she portrayed archaeologist Guilia Pedina. Nicole's versatility as an actress has seen her take on a range of compelling roles, from action-packed thrillers to historical dramas. She continues to work in both international and South African productions, bringing depth and authenticity to every character she portrays.Nicole's other interests include her award winning clean, kind, ethical skincare brand, Eco Diva Natural ,where she gets to create art through another medium of offering trans-dermal superfood skincare that focuses on holistic well-being.
